src_original: sa nānādigdeśanivāsibhir bhikṣubhir āvāsitaḥ tasya cāvavādena prabhūtair arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* //
tgt_original: 時諸大眾勤修匪懈，漸次有證羅漢果者。

src_original: so 'pareṇa samayena glānas saṃvṛttaḥ sa mūlagaṇḍapatrapuṣpaphalabhaiṣajyair upasthīyamāno hīyata eva /
tgt_original: 而此比丘後縈病苦，雖服妙藥轉增尫瘵。

src_original: tena sārdhaṃvihāriṇo uktāḥ /  āyuṣmanto jentākaṃ me uddiśya kuruta /
sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntās samucchrayāḥ  saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam iti //
tgt_original: 常者皆盡、高者亦墜、合會有離、生必歸滅。

src_original: tasya sārdhaṃvihārī arhāṃ samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ kutra me upādhyāya upapanna iti /
tgt_original: 時諸大眾及彼弟子，共營善利以資冥福，乃相議曰： 「我師趣寂，未知神識當生何所？

src_original: sa devāṃ vyavalokayitum ārabdho na paśyati manuṣyāṃs tiryaṃca pretāṃs tatrāpi na paśyati /
tgt_original: 」其弟子中有證聖者，乃入定觀，始於諸天、次及人間，乃至鬼畜皆悉不見，遂復遍觀諸地獄中，乃知其師墮無間獄。 弟子見已生大疑惑：

src_original: yāvan narakāṃ vyavalokayitum ārabdho paśyaty avīcau mahānarake upapannaḥ sa saṃlakṣayaty upādhyāyaś śīlavān bahuśruto dharmeṇa parṣadā saṃgṛhītā
tgt_original: 「我大和尚在世之日，堅持淨戒、多聞辯才，精進脩行未常暫廢，攝受供給八方僧眾。

src_original: kiṃ tena karma kṛtaṃ yenāvīcau mahānarake (51r = GBM 6.702)
upapanna iti sa samanvāhartuṃ pravṛtto yāvat paśyati mātṛghātaka iti /  so 'py āvīcikai raśmibhis spṛṣṭaḥ sa kathayati atitīkṣṇo 'yaṃ jentāke 'gnisantāpa iti /
tgt_original: 」時彼弟子復入定觀，乃見先因甞害其母，以是報故墮無間獄，熾然火聚而燒其身，為彼獄卒種種訶毀： 「汝在世時下劣無智，造此逆罪。

src_original: tato narakapālena mudgareṇa śirasi prahāraṃ datvā ukto mandabhāgya kutas te 'tra jentāko 'vīcir ayaṃ mahānarakaḥ /
tgt_original: 今遣誰當？ 」獄卒即以極熱鐵鎚以碎其首，血流悶絕，苦不可言。

src_original: sa mudgarābhihataḥ kuśalacittaḥ kālagataś cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ /
tgt_original: 是時弟子大阿羅漢，見是事已，運悲願力息除苦惱，憑法威德令知宿命，緣念三寶續其善根。 即時命絕，生夜摩天。

src_original: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante /
tgt_original: 法爾新生諸天子等，住彼天已起三種念：

src_original: kutaś cyutaḥ kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇeti sa paśyati narakebhyaś cyutaḥ cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ saṃghe jentākasnātraṃ kṛtvety
tgt_original: 一觀前身受生何族、二於何處身謝命終、三修何福得生天上。

src_original: atha narakapūrviṇo devaputrasyaitad abhavan na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso
tgt_original: 時彼天子作是觀已，乃見自身先造逆罪，承佛恩力得生此天。 而作是念：

src_original: bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyaṃ yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam iti /
tgt_original: 「我今一心無別異想，唯求見佛親近供養，以報大恩。

src_original: atha narakapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātro divyānām  utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndārakāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṃgaṃ pūrayitvā atikrāntavarṇo
tgt_original: 」由天福力，自然而有眾寶瓔絡莊嚴其身。

src_original: atikrāntāyāṃ rātryāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair
tgt_original: 於初夜分，身放光明照祇陀林皆悉顯現，前詣佛所，頭面禮足。

src_original: avakīrya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ apīdānīṃ narakapūrviṇo devaputrasyānubhāvena  sarvā kūṭāgāraśālā udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭābhūt* /
tgt_original: 即以天上眾色蓮華、曼陀羅華以散佛上，積過于膝。 作供養已，退坐一面。

src_original: tato bhagavatā narakapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī
tgt_original: 爾時世尊知彼天子心之所念，即為宣說四諦法輪三轉行相。
